### `ProjectHomePanel`

**Line:** 61

Collapsible Project Home panel similar to memoQ

#### Methods

##### `setup_ui()`

Setup the UI

##### `toggle_panel()`

Toggle panel expanded/collapsed

Handle item click

Override to allow animation
